conclusion: Analyze the p-V diagram to determine work done from state B to C.
The image shows a p-V diagram with a horizontal line from A to B (constant pressure) and a vertical line from B to C (constant volume).
Identify the process: AB is constant pressure, BC is constant volume.
Calculate work for AB: Work done is 300 J.
Identify work for BC: No work is done as it is a constant volume process.
Calculate total work: Work done from B to C is 300 J.
